mapper.sql: id, sbbh, tplj, cjsj, create_time, nf, yf, rq, xs, fz, deptcode, xmbh, wjlx, jczl, ly, sm1, sm2, sm3, sm4, sm5, sm6, `type`, ts, txtlx, wjmc
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from equipment_file_today
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from equipment_file_today
order by ${orderByClause}
union all select
distinct
from equipment_file_ty_today
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into equipment_file_today (id, sbbh, tplj, cjsj, create_time, nf, yf, rq, xs, fz, deptcode, xmbh, wjlx, jczl, ly, sm1, sm2, sm3, sm4, sm5, sm6, `type`, ts, txtlx, wjmc ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tplj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jczl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txtlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select:
SELECT deptcode `key` ,COUNT(*) `value` FROM equipment_file_today
and TO_DAYS(cjsj) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and txtlx='1' GROUP BY deptcode union all SELECT deptcode `key` ,COUNT(*) `value` FROM equipment_file_ty_today
and TO_DAYS(cjsj) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and txtlx='1' GROUP BY deptcode

SELECT sbbh `text` ,COUNT(*) `code` , deptcode FROM equipment_file_today
and TO_DAYS(cjsj) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY sbbh, deptcode union SELECT sbbh `text` ,COUNT(*) `code` , deptcode FROM equipment_file_ty_today
and TO_DAYS(cjsj) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY sbbh, deptcode

select sbbh,rq bjsj,count(*) alarmNum, deptcode from equipment_file
group by sbbh, rq, deptcode order by sbbh, rq, deptcode

select sbbh,count(*) alarmNum,fz, deptcode from equipment_file_today
group by sbbh, fz, deptcode order by sbbh, fz, deptcode

mapper.select:
select
from equipment_file_today where sbbh = #{sbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and txtlx='1' order by cjsj desc limit 1

SELECT sbbh,COUNT(*) bjcs,sum(ts) sumTs FROM equipment_file_today
GROUP BY sbbh
